snippet.title: DARK MOON REVERSE (Version 0.9) - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Newer Super Luigi Wii: DARK MOON REVERSE! This is a mod of New Super Mario Bros. Wii with assets from Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii. 

Luigi suddenly finds himself back on Evershade Isles, and reality has been reversed as if it existed in a mirror. Now he must journey through the night and retrace the path of his previous adventure, before facing the trials that lie beyond...

Features
- 9 new levels, reversed from Newer Super Luigi Wii: Dark Moon
- 27 tricky Purple Star Coins to collect
- Various recolored objects, tiles and enemies
- A new selection of music
- Player costumes
- Optional Luigi physics
- Secrets galore
- ...and more!

Coming in Version 1.0
- A "Boss Rush" challenge mixed with platforming segments
- 6 new levels based off of cut content from Newer Super Luigi Wii: Dark Moon
- Retro Mode (Super Mario Bros.-style visuals, 8-Bit music, higher difficulty)

DOWNLOAD LINK
https://mega.nz/file/w0BkyLIL#5VIRnZR8SQ47q9b4xN1ZFr1ZAmGq6f-cD_-XY3PouVc


Join our Discord to discuss the game, report bugs, or just post memes.
https://discord.gg/h5bXEdn

Trailer Music:
Sacrificial | The Binding of Isaac

Thanks for stopping by!
